text:
Not that side.
It's the other side, above your ear.

S-Sorry about that. I let my guard down. I didn't have any plans
for outdoor activities since I was fully focused on the training camp...

......
Even if you apologize to me,
It's better to fix it quickly, isn't it?
Well, but I have Nichika's lesson next...
Even if I don't look, I'll still do it properly, so it's okay.

Unlike Producer-san,
I'm not slacking off.

Haha... You're tough.
But even I don't slack off on my work.

Even if you say that with that head, it's not convincing,
you know.

...But still, it's important to keep an eye on Nichika.
If Nichika is concerned, then it can't be helped.

...Understood.
Please try to do it where it won't be noticed as much.
